thread.title: BRIEF-Spectrum Brands Expects 2018 Adjusted EBITDA From Continuing Operations To Be Between $657-$674 Million

title: BRIEF-Spectrum Brands Expects 2018 Adjusted EBITDA From Continuing Operations To Be Between $657-$674 Million
text: 46 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Spectrum Brands Expects 2018 Adjusted EBITDA From Continuing Operations To Be Between $657-$674 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 22 (Reuters) - Spectrum Brands Holdings Inc: * SPECTRUM BRANDS HOLDINGS INC - EXPECTS FISCAL 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS TO BE BETWEEN $657-$674 MILLION * SPECTRUM BRANDS - SEES GETTING $3.6 BILLION-$3.7 BILLION GROSS PROCEEDS BY 2018 END DUE TO PLANS TO DIVEST GLOBAL BATTERIES AND APPLIANCES BUSINESSES * SPECTRUM BRANDS - CONTINUES TO EXPECT 2018 REPORTED NET SALES FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS TO INCREASE ABOVE CATEGORY RATES FOR MOST CATEGORIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
